From: "FIRE FOX" <firefox_y2k@...>

Tavatron dropped her sword and raised her hands in front of her face in a 
last ditch effort to block the barrage of fire headed for her. She cringed 
and growled as the shots found their mark. Her armor was blackened and her 
fur burned, in some places to the point where it was nothing more than an 
unrecognizable mass of smoking metal.

Tavatron dropped to one knee, no longer able to stand under her own power. 
She roughly wiped away the silver mech-fluid that trickled down her face, 
falling in small drops on the smoking ground. She knelt there for a moment, 
a flickering status screen appearing before her barely lit optics:

Internal comp: Status critical, stasis lock imminent.

Tavatron fell forward, groaning softly. This really was suicide. What had 
they been thinking?! That Zardus would just let them walk away?! She took 
one last look up at Zardus just before her optics flickered out.

*Slag* she thought, *He's got Iron Raptor...* Tavatron's thought trailed off 
into nothingness as she was engulfed in darkness.
